alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:40PM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Valle. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 PM Wednesday: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches North Rim 7 to 11 inches Prescott 4 to 6 inches Prescott Valley 3 to 5 inches Sedona 4 to 6 inches Seligman 3 to 5 inches Valle 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains
